_sText:
(04/05/2019 -> DESCRIPTION UPDATED)
(02/18/2012 -> MAP UPDATED AND FIXED)

This map took months to get done... it was not hard to make at all, it's just the ideas that took a long time to show up. It's themed as a library, with wooden surf ramps and bookshelves inside a big room. 

There are plenty of secrets of how to get weapons and grenades. There's also one that takes you to an empty white room, with nothing but a lever... that kills everyone in the map (but you) when pulled. Plus, there are also 4 buttons in a bookshelf (the nearest to the clock) which can give you either AK-47, M4A1, SG552 or AUG. 

NOTE: It has a Bomb Zone too, in its very center. 
(for Terrorists to blow the shit up)

The following video shows all the secrets of the map and some free-styling. Enjoy!
Video
